languages.text: Shoots a small sliver needle coated with viral toxins. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for 3 turns, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer <u>(from 4 to 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} cannot be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Выстреливает небольшой иглой, на которую нанесены токсичные вещества. Три {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} подряд цель проводит {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала получает <u>(от 4 до 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Броня{/g} не уменьшает этот {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Shoots a small sliver needle coated with viral toxins. Every turn for 3 turns, the target must pass a Toughness test with a −15 penalty or suffer 4–6 toxic damage. This damage cannot be reduced by armour.

Shoots a small sliver needle coated with viral toxins. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for 3 turns, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer <u>(from 4 to 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} cannot be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

languages.text: 发射一根包裹着病毒毒素的细小银针。在接下来的3回合内，目标每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在检定中承受-15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果未能通过检定，会受到<u>4-6</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。此{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会被{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}效果降低。
languages.original_text: Shoots a small sliver needle coated with viral toxins. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for 3 turns, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer <u>(from 4 to 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} cannot be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 发射一根包裹着病毒毒素的细小银针。在接下来的3回合内，目标每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在检定中承受-15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果未能通过检定，会受到4-6点{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}无法降低此次伤害。

languages.text: ウイルス性の毒でコーティングされた小さい銀の針を放つ。3ターンまでの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−15で成功させる、あるいは<u>(4～6)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を受けなくてはならない。この{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}により軽減されない。
languages.original_text: Shoots a small sliver needle coated with viral toxins. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for 3 turns, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer <u>(from 4 to 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} cannot be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ウイルス性の毒でコーティングされた小さい銀の針を放つ。3ターンまでの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−15で成功させる、あるいは4から6の{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を受けなくてはならない。このダメージは{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}により軽減されない。

languages.text: Dispara una pequeña aguja de plata recubierta de toxinas víricas. Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} durante 3 turnos, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizador{/g} −15 o sufrir <u>(de 4 a 6)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} no reduce este {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for 3 turns, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer <u>(from 4 to 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} cannot be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} durante 3 turnos, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizador{/g} −15 o sufrir de 4 a 6 de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} no reduce este daño.

languages.text: Выстреливает небольшой иглой, на которую нанесены токсичные вещества. Три {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} подряд цель проводит {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала получает <u>(от 4 до 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Броня{/g} не уменьшает этот {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Выстреливает небольшой иглой, на которую нанесены токсичные вещества. Три {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} подряд цель проводит {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала получает 4–6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Броня{/g} не уменьшает этот урон.

Выстреливает небольшой иглой, на которую нанесены токсичные вещества. Три {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} подряд цель проводит {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала получает 4–6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичного урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Броня{/g} не уменьшает этот урон.

languages.text: Schießt eine kleine Silbernadel, die mit viralen Toxinen beschichtet ist. 3 Züge lang muss das Ziel jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −15 bestehen, sonst erleidet es <u>(von 4 bis 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} kann nicht durch {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} reduziert werden.
languages.original_text: Shoots a small sliver needle coated with viral toxins. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for 3 turns, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer <u>(from 4 to 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} cannot be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Schießt eine kleine Splitternadel, die mit viralen Toxinen beschichtet ist. 3 Züge lang muss das Ziel jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -15 bestehen, oder es erleidet 4-6 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}. Dieser Schaden kann nicht durch {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} reduziert werden.

languages.text: Tire une petite aiguille enduite de toxines virales. À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et ce, pendant 3 tours, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −15, faute de quoi elle subit <u>(de 4 à 6)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. L'{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}armure{/g} ne permet pas de réduire ces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: Shoots a small sliver needle coated with viral toxins. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for 3 turns, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer <u>(from 4 to 6)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} cannot be reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tire une petite aiguille enduite de toxines virales. À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et ce, pendant 3 tours, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -15, faute de quoi elle subit 4 à 6 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. L'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} ne permet pas de réduire ces dégâts.
